Using Twitter as a Simplified Message Distribution Platform (aka using Twitter how it was designed).

March 2009 · wordpress, republished, wayback, rest, c, fun, idea, patterns

Originally published on WordPress on March 29, 2009. View original article.

Archive note: Originally published on just3ws.wordpress.com. Republished from local Wayback snapshot exports.

In a nutshell, I can send short commands via DM to a Twitter account that is following me. On the servers I wish to control I have installed agents that monitor the Twitter account and listen for specific messages. Given a few priority and handling rules they can process and act on the message.
